page.title: 16 SQUIBB'S FACTORY
page.content:
{Squibb's}is an American company manufacturing drugs and medicines. The Moreton factory was opened in 1967 and the site was chosen because government help was available and communications and the local work force was good.
It cost Â£2 million to build and is now worth Â£10 million. The factory has been expanded 3 times and occupies 26 acres. It exports half of everything it makes. 600 people are employed here half of which are men.
They make 40 different products and send them to about 50 countries including Saudi Arabia, China and Australia. Raw materials are bought from other factories and made into medicines such as antibiotics and pills for lowering blood pressure. They make 50 million pills a year.
